question: It is true that planning involves thinking in advance about what needs to be done and how it will be done.

It is true that identifying the goal is not the first step in the planning process.

It is true that setting a timeline does not help in keeping track of progress and preventing delays.

It is true that following the plan is not crucial for successful execution.
